channel.title: News on Heathen Foray - Melodic Pagan Death Metal from Austria
channel.description: Recent content in News on Heathen Foray - Melodic Pagan Death Metal from Austria

item.title: New album 'Oathbreaker' out now
item.description:
The time has come! Today we released our new album "Oathbreaker"!

You can order a copy of the album here:

Order now

You can listen to it here:

Liste to the new album

If you prefer YouTube, you can also stream the full album there:

item.title: New single 'Oathbreaker' out now
item.description:
We have released the third single of our upcoming album "Oathbreaker"! The song is also called "Oathbreaker" and it is available now on your streaming platform of your choice:

Listen to the song now

There is also an official music video for the song:

Our new album "Oathbreaker" will be out April 7, 2023 via Massacre Records. You can pre-order the the album here:

Pre-Order now

We have released the second single of our upcoming album "Oathbreaker"! The song is also called "Ahnenreih" and it is available now on your streaming platform of your choice:

Listen to the song now

There is also an official lyrics video for the song:

Our new album "Oathbreaker" will be out April 7, 2023 via Massacre Records. You can pre-order the the album here:

item.title: New album coming
item.description:
Our new album “Oathbreaker” will be out April 7, 2023 via Massacre Records!

You can already pre-save the digital version of the album here: https://lnk.to/oathbreaker

Physical pre-order options will be available soon.

Cover artwork by Hans Trasid of Disartdesign

item.title: Wurzel Organic Shirt
item.description:
Our “Wurzel” (engl. “roots”) T-Shirt is not only a piece of fine clothing, but also a statement. In accordance with our pagan roots, we decided to create a shirt that expresses our personal connection to nature and the environment.

It shows a black logo made of tree roots. Printed on a high-quality Earth Positive Mens Organic T-Shirt in moss green. Made from 100% organic cotton in accordance with the Global Organic Textile Standard and produced using 100% renewable energy sources.

Order your T-Shirt here

item.title: Guitar Tabs for The Passage available
item.description:
You asked and you shall receive!

Get our new “The Passage” tab pack here: https://shop.heathenforay.com/products/the-passage-tabs

You can now play along to all the songs on our album “The Passage” with our tab collection. Songs included:

- Fading Tree
- Northstar
- Winterking
- Fortress Of Faith
- Chants
- Dragons Eyes
- Ancient Secrets
- Wolkenbruch
- Theatre Of Battle
- Wilderness Lore

10 tabs, each in Guitar Pro, TuxGuitar and MIDI compatible formats.

Instruments included:

- Guitars
- Bass
- Drums
- Orchestration (where applicable)

We included various subfolders. Each for a specific file format of the tab. The content of the tabs is the same in each format.

- GP = GuitarPro 7+
- GPX = GuitarPro 6+
- GP5 = GuitarPro 5+ / TuxGuitar
- MIDI = Anything that can open a MIDI file

Yes, we will also publish tabs for the other albums…soon.

You can get the tabs in our official merch shop:

https://shop.heathenforay.com/products/the-passage-tabs

item.title: Partnership with EMG
item.description:
It’s official now, we signed a partnership agreement with Extreme Management Group (EMG), home to bands like Suffocation, Cattle Decapitation, Rings of Saturn and more. Make sure to read our official press statement:

HEATHEN FORAY began their journey with the ambition to blend the heaviness of death metal with lighthearted and catchy melodies that will stay in your mind long after you heard them. This authentic mix, seasoned with folk music elements, paid off, as the band’s sing-along themes and skull splitting riffs earned them a following of underground metal fans and media tastemakers.

Whereas other bands in the general vicinity of this genre mix tend to dress up in medieval clothing or play Vikings on stage, HEATHEN FORAY made a clear statement that their kinship with the Pagan ways is a modern interpretation of them. What else is a modern Pagan than an activist for a cleaner environment, sustainable living, and social solidarity? This led to their music often being described as “Neo-Pagan-Metal” and their songs being, especially on their later releases, advocates against climate-change and oppression.

Metal Storm embraced the bands’ debut album The Passage with statements like “I listened to the first track … my jaw nearly dropped”. Various other media outlets awarded the band “Best Austrian Newcomer 2009” and nominations as “Best Folk/Pagan-Album 2009” along such genre titans as Ensiferum, Tyr and Korpiklaani.

Driven by the success of their debut album, the band released a follow up the next year. Media calling it “Pagan Metal in the best possible way” made Armored Bards a huge success for the band and got the band touring with genre greats like Ensiferum, Equilibrium and Black Messiah and earned them yet again nominations as “Best Folk/Pagan-Album 2010”.

After releasing their third album Inner Force in 2013, and diving from one tour into another, the band found a new home with Massacre Records. “Into Battle” hit stores in 2015 and is one of the band’s most successful records to date as songs like Fight and Silence will testify to.

Weltenwandel, their latest full-length offering to their fans, took a darker turn as the quintet’s hope for world-wide economic and environmental changes slowly started to fade as can be heard on pieces like Verfall and Tanz. Legacy magazine identified that “the new record underlines the natural maturation process of a special band” and Metal Temple awed in the splendor of this all German lyrics album with “The music becomes your guide…it’s really rewarding”.

While Amon Amarth and melodic death metal cultists like Children of Bodom and Insomnium are kindred spirits vocally, front man Robert Schroll draws his lyrical inspiration from his disgust with the late-stage-capitalism world we live in. Lyrics, for him, are a poetic artform that allows him to express the band’s united ideals on climate change, sustainability, exploitation, solidarity, and the fading connection of today’s society with nature. On early albums often telling an allegorical story, he has taken to addressing his misgivings, and the obvious carnage in the world, more candidly in later releases, the songs often being called “Soundtrack to Fridays for Future” by fans as Robert’s lyrics took on a more aggressive stance towards the agents of the engineered apocalypse.

Founder and guitarist Juergen Brueder has been the driving force behind the band’s aspirations since the very beginning. Sometimes overwhelming the other members with creative ideas and at other times the voice of reason, he has produced all the band’s records and guides every piece of music the band writes into its proven “Amon Amarth meets Blind Guardian” formular. Drummer Puma is named after an apex predator; it would be an easy joke and a severe understatement to say that his namesake gives him the ability to strike the drums just like a Puma slays his prey.

Brothers Max and Alex Wildinger, respectively playing bass and guitar, embraced the bands philosophy as well and live meat-free and as sustainable as possible while contributing, through their roots in classic heavy-metal and rock, most of the power metal spirit that can be heard in so many of the band’s creations. It is not by accident that the band’s rhythms are so tight and locked-in as the brothers have been performing together since their early childhood. Both seem to adjust to the other’s musical needs instinctively and it shows in every driving bassline and earth-shattering riff.

Through the years, all of them have become close friends. They are united in their shared belief for a better world and a responsible relationship to nature. Even though their musical essence can be somber at times, all the guys are fun loving and easygoing in everyday life.

HEATHEN FORAY’s sense of humor shows in their latest single-release. A cover version, that was infused with the band’s unmistakable DNA, of the Austrian hit folk song “Steirermen San Very Good” by “Die Stoakogler”. A mocking of the Austrian mainstream’s archaic views on society.

Combining death metal, power metal and spades full of folk influences, to create an original artistic identity of their own, HEATHEN FORAY secured a place in the golden halls of heavy metal in closer proximity to the all-time greats than characterless copies. HEATHEN FORAY represents authenticity in their heroic battle for heavy music, nature, and the society we live in.

Now, having inked a worldwide deal with Extreme Management Group (EMG), the band says: “With EMG and Scott, it immediately clicked. We felt right at home! With this powerhouse of a team, we will bring our heathen foray to more fans than ever before. Prost!” EMG said, “We are thrilled to be working with Heathen Foray and look forward to a great partnership!”

item.title: New single released
item.description:
“Steirermen San Very Good” is out now!

Liste on your favorite platform: https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/heathenforay/steirermen-san-very-good

or watch the official video:

https://www.youtube.com/embed/bPGkjzCnCPQ

item.title: Steirermen san very good
item.description:
Some of you guessed right! On 7th May, we release a metal cover of the Austrian multi-platinum hit “Steirermen san very good” by “Die Stoakogler”. Support us by pre-saving the song on Spotify:

https://distrokid.com/hyperfollow/heathenforay/steirermen-san-very-good

item.title: Single will be a cover
item.description:
Did we tell you, that our upcoming single is actually a cover version of a very very popular song?

Can you guess what song it is?

This picture might give you a hint!

item.title: New single coming
item.description:
We will release a new single on May 7th!

The name will remain a secret for the time being.

Here is the cover artwork:

item.title: Weltenwandel released
item.description:
The day has finally come! Today our new album “Weltenwandel” is released to the world!

You can buy or stream the album on all major platforms:

  • Bandcamp
  • Spotify
  • Amazon
  • Google
  • Apple Music

Listen to our single “Tanz” on YouTube

item.title: New single released
item.description:
Today marks the release of the very first single of our upcoming album “Weltenwandel”. The song is called “Tanz” and you can watch the music video on YouTube starting now!

Watch “Tanz” on YouTube

item.title: Artwork revealed
item.description:
Our new album “Weltenwandel” will hit the stores on February 21st!

The first single drops on January 28th, and the album will be available for pre-order soon!

Here is the cover artwork:

item.title: New album coming
item.description:
The long wait will soon be over! We will release our 5th studio album on 21st February 2020 through Massacre Records

The album will be called “Weltenwandel” and the artwork and track list will soon be released.

item.title: New Merch available
item.description:
As you know, we recently updated our logo a bit. Only makes sense to also issue some new merchandise to go with it, right?

We have produced a t-shirt and sweatshirt sporting the new logo and symbol!

Head over to our merchandise shop to pickup yours: Heathen Foray Merchandise Shop

item.title: Time for something new
item.description:
For many years, we used our classic Heathen Foray logo. However, times are changing and so are we.

From this day forward, we will be using a new logo. Why a new logo you ask? Well, maybe we needed something with more spikes for our upcoming album.

Soon we will reveal more!

item.title: What happens on tour? #5
item.description:
Come with us on the third day of our three day tour! Today we are conquering Brno. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to not miss any future episodes!

Watch day 3 of the tour here

item.title: What happens on tour? #4
item.description:
Come with us on the second day of our three day tour! Today we are conquering Frostfeurnächte festival. Day 3 will be out next week. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to not miss it!

Watch day 2 of the tour here

item.title: What happens on tour? #3
item.description:
Come with us on the first day of our three day tour! Today we are conquering Vienna. Day 2 will be out next week. Subscribe to our YouTube channel to not miss it!

Watch day 1 of the tour here

item.title: Tour announcement
item.description:
Come see us live:

    1. Feb 2019 VIPER ROOM, Vienna, Austria
    1. Feb 2019 FROSTFEUERNÄCHTE, Heidesee, Germany
    1. Feb 2019 HEATHEN ASSAULT OVER BRNO, Brno, Czech Republic

Find more info and tickets at the Facebook events links above!

item.title: Armored Bards Re-Release
item.description:
We are super happy to announce, that our second album “Armored Bards” is back in stores and on streaming platforms.

Download or stream it NOW!

  • Bandcamp: https://heathenforay.bandcamp.com/album/armored-bards
  • Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/0cC2vZRtKzmXgBPGeuKtmX
  • Amazon: https://www.amazon.de/dp/B07HHG5SZG/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1537433402&sr=8-1&keywords=heathen+foray+armored+bards
  • iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/armored-bards/1436714930?app=itunes&ign-mpt=uo%3D4
  • Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/music/album/Heathen_Foray_Armored_Bards?id=Btczw2ijhdoiqcivuiiuubouseu

  • Tidal:https://tidal.com/browse/album/95334736

item.title: Win The Passage Limited Edition and more
item.description:
After re-releasing our very first album “The Passage” last week, we want you to have a chance of winning what we call “The Package”.

It includes the limited edition “The Passage” digipak, a T-Shirt (size can be chosen by you after winning), a button and a sticker. You can find “The Passage” here at our Bandcamp page.

You can win by entering the raffle below. Win by taking the actions described, and remember the more actions you take the greater your chances of winning!

a Rafflecopter giveaway

To learn all about the new “The Passage Limited Edition” checkout our latest YouTube video:

Watch the video on YouTube

item.title: The Passage Re-Release
item.description:
We are super happy to announce, that our very first album “The Passage” is back in stores and on streaming platforms.

This album won “Best Austrian Newcomer 2009 (folkmetal.at)” and was nominated for “Best Pagan-Album 2009 (metalstorm.net)”.

Download or stream it NOW or Robert will come and find you!

Watch the video on YouTube

item.title: QnA #1 with Heathen Foray
item.description:
We are trying something new today: Answering your questions through a YouTube video. You want your questions answered in our next Q&A video? Leave a comment!

Watch the video on YouTube

item.title: New Line-Up revealed
item.description:
It has been far too long. We have returned from our slumber with a new line-up and are ready to bring Heathen Foray back on stage very soon.

We are happy to announce, that Heathen Foray founder Jürgen has returned! He will continue his duties on guitars and will be heavily involved in the creation process of our upcoming 5th studio album. Jürgen played a major role in the songwriting of “The Passage” and “Armored Bards” and we know that you will love the songs he has already written for our next album.

Heathen Foray are:

  • Vocals / Robert Schroll
  • Guitars / Jürgen Brüder
  • Guitars / Alex Wildinger
  • Bass / Max Wildinger
  • Drums / Markus “Puma” Kügerl

item.title: Crowdfunding for upcoming album
item.description:
We started a Crowdfunding Project for our upcoming Album.

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/heathen-foray-album-release-2015

item.title: Inner Force is released
item.description:
Our new CD, called “Inner Force” is now available for purchase:

http://heathenforay.bandcamp.com/

item.title: New release comming
item.description:
We are proudly announcing some real news! The new year will bring a new CD! We will rush into the studio right from the first weeks of 2013!

During the next weeks we will provide you more details!

item.title: Line-Up change
item.description:
Jürgen and Franz will leave the band due to professional reasons.We wish both of them all the best for the future. Replacements for both were already been found.

If you want to see Heathen Foray for one last time in this lineup: The last show with the recent lineup will be on the 29th October at the Kulturhalle Lafnitz. This will be our “Farewell” show for Jürgen and Franz.

item.title: We have a winner
item.description:
An we have a winner!

Florian Langeder wins our fan-package.

Congratulations! We will be in touch with you very soon.

item.title: Black Trolls in Traun, Austria
item.description: We will play a guest show on the upcoming Black Trolls Over Europe Tour. See you next week in Traun, Austria! http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=132280636839791

item.title: 5th anniversary show in Graz
item.description:
This year Heathen Foray celebrates its 5th anniversary! For this special occasion we will play a show in Graz on 25th March 2011 at the Explosiv. Also playing are Exanimalis, Sweet Sorrow, Menneskeeter and Bloodfeast.

Tickets are available at the bands!

item.title: Competition starts today!
item.description:
Today starts our fan competition!

Go to our Facebook-Page and post your ultimate Heathen Foray picture. The one that gets the most “likes” until the 6th January 2011 will win the competition.

The crazier the better. The more creative your picture is the bigger the chance to win the ultimate Heathen Foray fanpackage:

  • Limited Edition “Armored Bards”
  • T-Shirts “Armored Bards”
  • A piece of Robert’s stageoutfit
  • Tourplecs used and played by our guitarists
  • Setlist of Heidenfest 2010 and Black Trolls Over Europe Tour (used on stage)
  • One of Franz’s drumheads (signed by the band)
  • Parts of Max’s stageoutfit

You do not have your own Facebook-Profile? Send your picture via email and we will post it for you.

item.title: Fan competition
item.description:
Before this year comes to an end we will have a competition for you all.

This competition offers prices that every fan will love - among the prices are items that can’t be bought in shops.

The rules to enter the contest will be posted soon!

A little tip: You should be our friend on Facebook to enter the contest.

item.title: Livevideos from Black Trolls tour
item.description:
We released three videos of our gig in Uster (Switzerland)!

You can find the links to the videos here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCt7nX-8clzcc4pI_YPNaP5Q

item.title: On Tour
item.description: For all of you who want to see us on the “Black Trolls over Europe” Tour: We will play as second or third band. We are looking forward to you!

item.title: Tickets for 2nd October
item.description: You can now get into our albumreleasegig on 2nd October on a special price. Just write an E-Mail, Facebook-, Twitter- or MySpace-Message and you will only pay 7 Euros for entrance.

item.title: Live at Heidenfest
item.description:
As special bonus to our album-release on 24th September, we will be playing as Special-Guest at the Heidenfest in Vienna on 25th September. We will share the stage with Ensiferum, Equilibrium, Twiglight of the Gods and Swashbuckle.

http://www.heidenfest.eu

item.title: Limited edition
item.description:
You can listen to the third sample of our new album “Armored Bards” right here. This song is the opener-track and is also called “Armored Bards”.

Furthermore, we can give you information on the Limited Edition of the album. This edition will be released in a wooden box incl. patch, signed picture and the original CD. Also, it will be limited to 400 and will only be available at concerts.

item.title: Albumtrailer
item.description: Watch the trailer for our upcoming album “Armored Bards” on our YouTube channel.

item.title: STP Metal Weekend Tickets
item.description: Tickets for the STP Metal Weekend on 17./18. September are available for 12 Euros. If you are interested, just send us a message.

item.title: Second sample online
item.description: Today we present you the second sample of our upcoming album “Armored Bards”. You can download “Bifrost” here.

item.title: Second sample online
item.description: Now you can download a sample of the song “The Blight” from our new album “Armored Bards”.

item.title: Armored Bards
item.description: The wait is over! Here are all the infos about our new album “Armored Bards”. The new album will contain 10 songs and 1 video clip. It will be released as a normal CD and a “Limited Edition”! Until the release on 24th September 2010 we will be releasing samples of the songs. The first sample will follow shortly.

item.title: Albumrelease show
item.description:
Our new album will be released on the end of september. Therefore, we will be hosting a special gig to celebrate this event together with our good friends of Perishing Mankind. They also will present their new album on this date. The gig will be on the 2nd of October 2010 at the new Explosiv in Graz.

We will perform new material from the new album there for the first time. Further bands aren Artas, Bloodfeast and Behind The Screen.

Tickets will be available through us and the other bands. As soon as we have them, we will tell you. Be patient!

item.title: Black Trolls over Europe Tour
item.description:
Together with Black Messiah, Negura Bunget, Nomans Land, Adorned Brood, Dyrathor and Wolfchant we will play the “Black Trolls over Europe”-Tour this October.

Here are the dates:

  • 08.10.2010 DE, Bonn, Klangstation
  • 09.10.2010 DE, Gera, Sächsischer Bahnhof
  • 10.10.2010 DE, Darmstadt, Steinbruchtheater
  • 11.10.2010 DE, Flensburg, Roxy
  • 12.10.2010 DE, Hamburg, Headbeangers Ballroom
  • 13.10.2010 DE, Essen, Turock
  • 14.10.2010 DE, Ludwigsburg, Rockfabrik
  • 15.10.2010 CH, Uster, Stadhofsaal
  • 16.10.2010 DE, Ruhla, Waldeshall Festival
  • 17.10.2010 NL, Rotterdam, Baroeg

item.title: Finished recording
item.description: A few days ago, we finished recording vocals for our new album. The vocals were the last item to record. The material is now being mixed and we are looking forward to release the new album this October.

item.title: Ragnarök / Fiesta Pagana Stagetimes
item.description:
After receiving tons of mails concerning our stagetimes for this weekend, we can finally post the official times for you:

  • Friday - 30th April - RAGNARÖK FESTIVAL: 1:40 pm
  • Saturday - 1st May - FIESTA PAGANA: 3:15 pm

item.title: New album
item.description: Yesterday, we started the recording of our next, still unnamed, album at the Rockstudio. The album will be containing 10 new songs and will be released in October 2010. Until then, we will inform you here about our progress. So stay tuned!

item.title: Nominated for best pagan album
item.description:
After you already made us “Best Newcomer 2009”, you now have the chance to get us “Best Pagan-Album 2009”!

The biggest international metalzine metalstorm.ee has nominated us, together with Ensiferum, Tyr etc., for best Pagan-Album 2009.

You can vote here if you register at metalstorm.ee!

item.title: We win newcomer award 2009
item.description:
The votes are counted: Heathen Foray wins with a majority of votes in Folkmetal.at’s “Best Newcomer 2009” voting.

We want to thank all of you who voted for us! There is yet a lot to come in 2010.

item.title: Attention Switzerland
item.description:
We start the new year with our first gig in Switzerland ever! Our fans can see us on the 29th January at the Met-Bar in Lenzburg.

http://www.met-bar.ch

item.title: Nominated for best newcomer
item.description:
Heathen Foray was nominated in the category “Newcomer 2009” of Folkmetal.at’s voting of the best Folk-Bands. You can now vote for us here.

http://www.folkmetal.at

item.title: Mini Tour
item.description:
After our tour with Battlelore, we continue touring this year with a small 4 date tour in december. We will be playing Germany from the 27th till the 30th december with Nomans Land and Obscurity.

  • 27.12 Black Troll Winterfest, Zeche Carl, Essen
  • 28.12 Pagan Winterfest, Bad Salzungen
  • 29.12 Gleis3, Annaberg-Buchholz
  • 30.12 Sächsicher Bahnhof, Gera

item.title: Tourreport
item.description:
Our friends of Stormbringer.at have posted our tourreport.

You can find it here. http://www.stormbringer.at/specials.php?id=74

item.title: Changes in tourdates
item.description:
The tourplan with Battlelore changed a little bit today. Instead of the show at the Orpheum (Graz, Austria) we will be playing an additional show at the Kreuz (Ottweiler, Germany).

For all our fans that wanted to see us live in Graz, we offer special tickets for our show at the Kulturkeller (Gleisdorf, Austria). Just contact us an we will arrange those tickets for you.

item.title: On tour with Battlelore
item.description:
We are happy to tell you that we will be accompanying BATTLELORE on their Northern Crown Tour this November through Austria and Germany.

You can find the tourdates under LIVE.

Additionaly, our forum was relaunched is ready for your questions! All users of testphase are welcome to register again.

item.title: Woodstone Festival
item.description:
This year’s Woodstone Festival again takes place in Stallhof bei Stainz. The ticketprice is a voluntary donation to fighting childcancer. Don’t miss your chance to see a whole bunch of excellent bands for very low price.

Heathen Foray supports this noble cause of fighting childcancer. So there is no reason for you to not come to the show on the 1st of august!

item.title: Live on air
item.description: On friday the 25th Mai 9-10pm (MET), Markus and Jürgen will be guests on Metallic Underground Radio. They will talk about our new album “The Passage” and introduce some songs. You can also win some “The Passage” CDs!

item.title: First sample of new album
item.description:
“The Passage” reaches the end of it’s production-phase. You better mark the 24th April 2009 in your calender! The album will be officially released on this date.

Until then, we will post some samples of “The Passage” on the web. Today, the first song is online!

item.title: Band of the month
item.description:
This month has a lot to offer for Heathen Foray fans!

Austrian metalzine Darkscene features us in this months top-story with an interview and an exciting review (8/10).

Furthermore, we are officially “Band of the Month” on Metalfabrik.net

item.title: The Passage release
item.description:
Today is the release of our new album “The Passage”. You can now download a new song (Dragon’s Eyes) from our website! We have also gathered the first reviews for you:

  • Legacy 10/14
  • MetalHammmer 4.3/7
  • RockHard 7,5/10
  • Metalstorm 8.3/10
  • Osnametal 4/5
  • MetalMessage 8/10
  • InnJoy 8/10
  • HardHarderHeavy 6/7
  • Hell is Open 8.5/10
  • Schwermetall 9/13
  • Stormbringer 4/5

You can find them here!

item.title: Signed with Black Bards Entertainment
item.description:
Well, after weeks of being forced to silence we can now tell you why it was so quiet on this website.

We have officially signed a europewide record-deal with the german label Black Bards Entertainement. We now also get professionel assitance when it comes to booking…so we will definately play even more gigs this year.

Our first album is already in the end-phase of its production and we will soon post more information about it on this website. So keep checking back…and while you wait: Check out our new promotionphotos.

item.title: New website
item.description:
After long silence we present you our new Homepagedesign!

Don’t forget to check out our brand new forum and the sample from this year’s studiowork.

Better keep your eyes open…maybe there will be some special news around soon.

item.title: New man on bass
item.description:
We thank all of you who supported us at Pagenfest yesterday! We did not expect such a great acceptance. Thanks to all of you!

All of you who joined us yesterday at Pagenfest allready now it, Heathen Foray has a new man on bass. We welcome our new bandmember Markus Wildinger!

item.title: Paganfest
item.description:
On 20th of April we support ENSIFERUM, MOONSORROW, KORPIKLAANI,TYR and ELUVEITIE at Graz (Orpheum) on their Pagan Fest Tour.

Get the last tickets! info@heathenforay.com

To celebrate this with you we put a new song from our Demo “Forest” in the page for download!

item.title: Northern Lights cancelled
item.description:
The location for our gig on the 29th March was moved to the “DIAVOLO” in Graz.

Furthermore, we have to tell you that we will not be playing at this year’s Northern Lights Festival because is was canceled by the organizer. For a detailled explanation please check the NLF website.

item.title: New gig
item.description:
We have a bunch of new infos for you!

On the 29th March we will rock with Rest in Fear, Project Anima and Agonys Despair the WIST (Moserhofgasse) in Graz!

The location of the Northern Lights Festival was moved to the Burgruine Ruttenstein (OÖ)!

item.title: Forest release on September 1st
item.description:
After long silence we have new news for you.

As you might know we spent the last months on working onour first demo record. “Forest” will be out in September and will contain 4 songs.

And keep your eyes on the 1st September!

item.title: Audience choice in Linz
item.description:
We are back from Linz! Heathen Foray reached most of the audiencevotes with a total number of 61. However, we were not allowed to proceed to the semifinals.

You cannot understand the rating system of the Metalchamp-contest? Well, we cannot either.

item.title: Back in the studio
item.description:
Heathen Foray will rock the Arcadium Graz together with EQUILIBRIUM, Interregnum and Midgard. Date will be anounced soon!

We are also pleased to say that we continued our work on our CD a few weeks ago.

So stay tuned for some updates!

item.title: Second place!
item.description:
Heathen Foray played the Orpheum Newcomer Bandcontestâ€œ last sunday.

We reached the 2nd place of the audience-voting with 82 votes! We just came 7 votes after the 1st place. Therefore we won’t be playing the next round of the contest.

We want to thank all our friends and families that supported us so well. Through your support it feels like a victory to us! Our special thanks go to our friends of Arctic Light, Contra/Verse and Interregnum who supported us throughout the show.

A live recording of the concert will be available on our homepage within the next days!

item.title: Safet leaves
item.description:
Our Guitarist Safet has left Heathen Foray!

Safet decided to attempt his musical future without Heathen Foray. We wish him all the best in his future.

It is a great honor for us to announce that there is a new member in Heathen Foray. Bernd Zahn will undertake the guitars!

There are also some new Promo/Rehersalpics in our MEDIA section available!

item.title: Metalchamp
item.description:
Heathen Foray is now a part of Europe´s leading battle for metal bands!

www.metalchamp.org

New Live-Dates are coming soon!

item.title: Demo release postponed
item.description:
First of all, we have some bad news: We were not able to enter the studio this January because of some private issues . So the DEMO Release will be postponed to the end of March. We are confident that it will be ready till then.

And now some good news: Heathen Foray will be playing some gigs this spring. Exact dates are not fixed by now but we will let you know on our homepage as soon as they are fixed.

As a little consolation we make our “Eye of the Dragon Intro” available for download in our musicsection!

item.title: Demo release postponed
item.description: You can now access our webshop! So it is possible for you now to order “Forest” via our homepage.

item.title: On the battlefield
item.description:
We are sorry to inform you that Rigor Mortis can’t play at the “On the Battlefield” festival in Deutschlandsberg. Nevertheless the organisators found a more than fitting replacement. Verreck Attack will perfom instead of Rigor Mortis.

We are looking forward to see you on the 9th of December!

item.title: First gig
item.description:
First of all we want to thank you for the wonderful feedback on our homepage! A lot of people asked us for samples of our songs. Unfortunately you have to wait till the turn of the year. After that we will enter the studio a record our first Demo CD. There will be of course some samples for you on our homepage!

The reason why we cannot record the songs earlier is our first liveperformance on the 12th of December at the SUBWAY Deutschlandsberg. We hope do meet some of you there!

item.title: Website online
item.description:
HeathenForay.com goes online!

Keep on checking back for updates. There will be a lot of updates soon!
